config.name: statistics.on
config.description: A boolean value indicating whether enabling message statistics through JMX

config.name: managementNodeNotFoundHandler.maxNum
config.description: the max cache size of error handlers that resend messages to a temporary offline management node

config.name: managementNodeNotFoundHandler.timeoutInSecs
config.description: the timeout of error handlers that resend messages to a temporary offline management node lives in the cache, in secs. This value should not be set to a value more than 180 seconds because a temporary management offline is usually very short due to management node heartbeats
